price: Humo hawatasikia porojo wala maneno ya dhambi,
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا
footnotes: Huko Peponi hawatasikia maneno yasiyo kuwa na maana, wala masimulizi ya kumtia dhambini mwenye kuyasikia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
